metadata.title: 大学英语四六级测试题库
metadata.description: 包含基础版50题和完整版100题的四六级英语测试题库

questions.question: The company's new policy will ____ the working hours of all employees.
questions.explanation: extend意为'延长、扩展'，常用于时间、距离等；expand意为'扩大、扩展'，多用于规模、范围等；expend意为'花费、消耗'；expedite意为'加快、促进'。根据语境，这里应该选择extend，表示延长工作时间。

questions.question: The teacher asked us to ____ the text into our own words.
questions.explanation: translate意为'翻译'，符合语境；transfer意为'转移、转账'；transform意为'转变、改变'；transmit意为'传输、传播'。老师要求我们用自己的话翻译文本。

questions.question: The weather is becoming ____ colder as winter approaches.
questions.explanation: increasingly意为'越来越...'，表示程度的逐渐增加；incrementally意为'递增地'；intensively意为'密集地'。根据语境，increasingly最合适。

questions.question: She showed great ____ in handling the difficult situation.
questions.explanation: competence意为'能力、胜任力'，强调处理复杂情况的能力；ability泛指能力；capability指潜在能力；skill指具体技能。

questions.question: Please ____ the lights before leaving the room.
questions.explanation: turn off意为'关闭'；turn down意为'调低'；turn up意为'调高'；turn on意为'打开'。离开房间前应该关灯。

questions.question: The news of his promotion came as a ____ surprise to everyone.
questions.explanation: unexpected意为'意外的、始料未及的'，最符合语境；sudden强调突然性；unpredictable强调不可预测性；unusual强调不寻常。

questions.question: The committee will ____ the proposal at next week's meeting.
questions.explanation: consider意为'考虑、审议'，最符合委员会审议提案的语境；regard常与as连用；think about表示思考；contemplate表示沉思、深思。

questions.question: His ____ attitude towards work impressed the management team.
questions.explanation: conscientious意为'认真负责的、尽责的'，强调道德责任感；diligent强调勤奋；industrious强调勤劳；assiduous强调持续努力。

questions.question: The meeting is scheduled ____ 3 PM tomorrow.
questions.explanation: at用于表示具体的时间点；in用于年、月、季节等；on用于具体的日期；by表示截止时间。3 PM是具体时间点，用at。

questions.question: I can't ____ why she refused to help us.
questions.explanation: figure out意为'理解、弄明白'，多用于理解原因或情况；work out强调解决、计算出；find out强调发现真相；make out强调辨认出。

questions.question: The ____ of the research data requires careful analysis.
questions.explanation: volume在数据语境中意为'容量、数据量'；amount强调总量；quantity强调数量；mass强调质量。根据语境，volume最合适。

questions.question: Could you ____ me a favor and help me with this problem?
questions.explanation: do a favor是固定搭配，意为'帮忙'；make a favor不是标准搭配；give和show不与favor搭配使用。

questions.question: The ____ nature of quantum physics makes it difficult to understand.
questions.explanation: abstract意为'抽象的'，强调难以直观理解；complex强调复杂但可理解；complicated强调复杂且难以处理；sophisticated强调精密复杂。

questions.question: The government decided to ____ the new policy immediately.
questions.explanation: implement意为'实施、执行'，强调将计划或政策付诸实施；execute强调执行命令；enforce强调强制执行；apply强调应用。

questions.question: Please write your name on the ____ line.
questions.explanation: dotted line意为'虚线、点线'，常用于填写签名；dashed line也是虚线，但dotted更常用；broken line意为'断线'；faint line意为'淡线'。

questions.question: I ____ in this city for five years.
questions.explanation: 现在完成时表示过去发生的动作对现在造成的影响或持续到现在。for five years表示时间段，用现在完成时have lived。lived是一般过去时，不表示持续到现在；am living是现在进行时；live是一般现在时。

questions.question: The new library ____ last year.
questions.explanation: last year是过去时间状语，用一般过去时。library是动作的承受者，用被动语态was built。built是主动语态；has built是现在完成时主动语态；has been built是现在完成时被动语态。

questions.question: The book ____ I bought yesterday is very interesting.
questions.explanation: 先行词是book，在从句中作宾语，用关系代词which。who指人；where指地点；what不能引导定语从句。

questions.question: She ____ be at home now because her car is in the garage.
questions.explanation: must表示有把握的推测，意为'一定、准是'。根据car在garage这个有力证据，可以很有把握地推测她在家。can表示能力；may表示可能性较小的推测；should表示应该。

questions.question: My dream is ____ a doctor.
questions.explanation: 不定式to become作表语，表示将来的动作。My dream is to become...是固定结构。becoming是动名词；become是动词原形；to becoming语法错误。

questions.question: If I ____ more time, I would learn another language.
questions.explanation: 这是与现在事实相反的虚拟条件句，从句用一般过去时had，主句用would + 动词原形。have是现在时；will have是将来时；would have是虚拟过去时。

questions.question: She is interested ____ learning Chinese.
questions.explanation: interested in是固定搭配，意为'对...感兴趣'。其他介词不与interested搭配使用。

questions.question: I don't know ____ he will come tomorrow.
questions.explanation: whether引导宾语从句，表示'是否'。if也可以引导宾语从句，但在正式文体中多用whether。that引导陈述性宾语从句；what引导名词性从句但意思不符。

questions.question: ____ the weather, we decided to go for a walk.
questions.explanation: Despite是介词，后面接名词the weather。Although是从属连词，后面接句子；In spite of也是介词，但不如despite常用；Regardless of是介词，意为'不管、不顾'，不符合语境。

questions.question: This book is ____ than that one.
questions.explanation: interesting是多音节形容词，比较级用more + 形容词原形。most interesting是最高级；interesting是原级；interestinger是错误形式。

questions.question: He ____ to school every day.
questions.explanation: 主语He是第三人称单数，谓语动词用第三人称单数形式goes。go是动词原形；going是现在分词；gone是过去分词。

questions.question: The house ____ we lived was very old.
questions.explanation: lived in the house，介词in提前，用in which。which指代house，在从句中作介词in的宾语。where是副词，不能与介词连用；in where语法错误。

questions.question: ____ the report, he went home.
questions.explanation: 现在分词的完成式Having finished表示动作发生在谓语动词went之前。Finishing表示同时发生；Finished是过去分词，不能作状语；To finish表示目的，不符合语境。

questions.question: ____ was John who broke the vase.
questions.explanation: It was...who...是强调句型，强调主语John。He不能用于强调句；That和This不能构成强调句型。

questions.question: You ____ be tired after such a long journey.
questions.explanation: must表示很有把握的推测，意为'一定、准是'。根据long journey这个原因，可以很有把握地推测他累了。can表示能力；may表示可能性；should表示应该。

questions.question: According to the passage, what is the main purpose of the study?
questions.explanation: 根据文章内容，研究的主要目的是调查学生表现。选项A、C、D都不是文章的主要研究目的。

questions.question: What can be inferred from the passage about the author's attitude?
questions.explanation: 从文章中可以看出作者对所讨论的问题持乐观态度，文中使用了积极正面的词汇和表述。

questions.question: How many students participated in the survey?
questions.explanation: 文章明确提到有250名学生参与了调查。

questions.question: What does the word 'sustainable' most probably mean in the passage?
questions.explanation: 根据上下文，'sustainable'在文章中指的是环境友好的、可持续的，与环保概念相关。

questions.question: What is likely to be the next step according to the passage?
questions.explanation: 根据文章的逻辑结构，作者在最后提到了需要进行进一步研究来验证结果，因此下一步很可能是进行更深入的研究。

questions.question: When was the new policy implemented?
questions.explanation: 文章提到新政策是在上个月实施的。

questions.question: What is the main topic of the passage?
questions.explanation: 文章主要讨论教育改革问题，从头到尾都在围绕教育改革的各个方面展开论述。

questions.question: Which of the following is mentioned as a benefit?
questions.explanation: 文章提到了降低成本、提高效率和改善质量三个方面的益处。

questions.question: What is the author's purpose in writing this passage?
questions.explanation: 作者的写作目的是提供信息，文章主要在客观地介绍某个现象或情况，没有明显的说服或批评意图。

questions.question: Where did the main character work?
questions.explanation: 文章提到主人公在一所学校工作。

questions.question: What does the phrase 'in the long run' mean in this context?
questions.explanation: 'in the long run'是固定短语，意为'从长远来看、最终'，与eventually意思相近。

questions.question: What is implied about the future of this industry?
questions.explanation: 文章暗示该行业将快速发展，作者提到了技术创新、市场需求增长等多个积极因素。

questions.question: What percentage of students agreed with the proposal?
questions.explanation: 文章提到80%的学生同意这个提议。

questions.question: How does the author feel about the current situation?
questions.explanation: 作者对当前情况表示担忧，文中使用了'concerned'、'worried'等词汇表达这种态度。

questions.question: How long does the program last?
questions.explanation: 文章明确提到这个项目持续6个月。

questions.question: Which of the following best summarizes the passage?
questions.explanation: 文章主要分析了当前存在的问题，并提出了相应的解决方案。

questions.question: What is the minimum age requirement?
questions.explanation: 文章提到最低年龄要求是18岁。

questions.question: What can be concluded from the last paragraph?
questions.explanation: 从最后一段可以得出结论，需要进行更多的研究来彻底解决这个问题。

questions.question: What does 'crucial' mean in this context?
questions.explanation: 根据上下文，'crucial'意为'关键的、重要的'，与important意思相同。

questions.question: What is the deadline for submission?
questions.explanation: 文章提到提交的截止日期是本周结束前。

questions.question: The ____ of the experiment was compromised by poor laboratory conditions.
questions.explanation: validity意为'有效性、正确性'，强调实验结果的正确性；reliability强调可靠性；accuracy强调准确性；precision强调精确性。

questions.question: Her ____ smile could not hide her disappointment.
questions.explanation: feigned意为'假装的、伪装的'，多用于情感或表情；faked强调伪造；pretended强调假装行为；counterfeit强调伪造的（多用于物品）。

questions.question: The ____ between theory and practice is often wider than expected.
questions.explanation: gap在理论与实践语境中意为'差距、鸿沟'，最常用；disparity强调不公平的差异；difference泛指差异；distinction强调区别。

questions.question: The ____ majority of students passed the examination.
questions.explanation: overwhelming majority是固定搭配，意为'绝大多数'；predominant强调占主导地位的；dominant强调占支配地位的；major强调主要的。

questions.question: The committee will ____ the candidate's qualifications thoroughly.
questions.explanation: scrutinize意为'仔细检查、审查'，强调详细严格的检查；examine强调检查；investigate强调调查；inspect强调检查（多用于实物）。

questions.question: The company's financial situation is now ____.
questions.explanation: precarious意为'不稳定的、危险的'，强调情况危急；unstable强调不稳定；uncertain强调不确定；risky强调有风险的。

questions.question: The researcher's ____ conclusions were based on limited data.
questions.explanation: premature意为'过早的、草率的'，强调结论过于匆忙；preliminary强调初步的；tentative强调试探性的；provisional强调临时的。

questions.question: The new manager will ____ the department next month.
questions.explanation: assume意为'承担、担任'，常用于职位；undertake强调承担任务；accept强调接受；undergo强调经历。

questions.question: The ____ of the ancient manuscript has been a challenge for scholars.
questions.explanation: deciphering强调破译难以理解的文字；decoding强调解码；interpreting强调解释；translating强调翻译。

questions.question: The witness was unable to ____ the suspect in the lineup.
questions.explanation: identify意为'识别、辨认'，强调确认身份；recognize强调认出；distinguish强调区分；differentiate强调区别。

questions.question: The ____ of the economic crisis affected global markets.
questions.explanation: repercussion意为'深远影响、后果'，强调连锁反应；consequence强调后果；aftermath强调灾难后的时期；impact强调影响。

questions.question: The team's ____ effort led to the project's success.
questions.explanation: concerted effort是固定搭配，意为'共同努力'；combined强调联合的；joint强调共同的；unified强调统一的。

questions.question: The committee decided to ____ the controversial proposal.
questions.explanation: shelve意为'搁置、暂缓考虑'，强调暂时搁置；postpone强调延期；defer强调推迟；suspend强调暂停。

questions.question: The patient's condition is now ____ after the successful surgery.
questions.explanation: stable在医学语境中意为'稳定的'，强调病情稳定；steady强调稳定的；consistent强调一致的；constant强调持续的。

questions.question: The ____ of his argument was difficult to follow.
questions.explanation: intricacy强调错综复杂、难以理解；complexity强调复杂性；sophistication强调精密复杂；elaboration强调详细阐述。

questions.question: The company will ____ its operations to reduce costs.
questions.explanation: streamline意为'精简、优化流程'，强调提高效率；simplify强调简化；optimize强调优化；modernize强调现代化。

questions.question: The ____ approach to problem-solving proved most effective.
questions.explanation: systematic意为'系统性的'，强调有组织有计划的方法；methodical强调有序的；structured强调结构化的；organized强调组织良好的。

questions.question: The ____ of the new technology will revolutionize the industry.
questions.explanation: adoption意为'采用、采纳'，强调接受新技术的过程；implementation强调实施；integration强调整合；deployment强调部署。

questions.question: The research findings will ____ our understanding of the phenomenon.
questions.explanation: enhance意为'增强、提高'，强调使理解更加深入；improve强调改善；advance强调推进；refine强调精炼。

questions.question: The ____ impact of the policy was felt across all sectors.
questions.explanation: widespread意为'广泛的、普遍的'，强调影响范围大；extensive强调广泛的；comprehensive强调全面的；profound强调深远的。

questions.question: The ____ of the situation requires immediate action.
questions.explanation: urgency意为'紧急性'，强调需要立即行动；severity强调严重性；gravity强调严重性；criticality强调关键性。

questions.question: The team ____ to reach a consensus after hours of discussion.
questions.explanation: managed to do something强调成功完成某事；succeeded强调成功；achieved强调实现目标；accomplished强调完成。

questions.question: The ____ nature of the problem makes it difficult to solve.
questions.explanation: intricate强调错综复杂的；complex强调复杂的；complicated强调复杂的；sophisticated强调精密复杂的。

questions.question: The ____ of resources has become a major concern.
questions.explanation: scarcity强调稀缺性；shortage强调短缺；lack强调缺乏；deficiency强调不足。

questions.question: The committee will ____ the proposal before making a decision.
questions.explanation: deliberate强调仔细考虑、深思熟虑；consider强调考虑；evaluate强调评估；assess强调评价。

questions.question: The ____ scale of the project required significant investment.
questions.explanation: massive强调大规模的；enormous强调巨大的；huge强调巨大的；immense强调巨大的。

questions.question: The ____ of the evidence was overwhelming.
questions.explanation: weight在证据语境中意为'分量、重要性'；significance强调意义；importance强调重要性；relevance强调相关性。

questions.question: The organization will ____ its efforts to reach more people.
questions.explanation: intensify强调加强努力；enhance强调增强；strengthen强调加强；amplify强调放大。

questions.question: The ____ nature of the research requires careful methodology.
questions.explanation: empirical强调基于经验的；theoretical强调理论的；abstract强调抽象的；conceptual强调概念的。

questions.question: The ____ of the new system will improve efficiency.
questions.explanation: implementation强调实施过程；installation强调安装；deployment强调部署；execution强调执行。

questions.question: If I ____ known about the meeting, I would have attended it.
questions.explanation: 这是与过去事实相反的虚拟条件句，从句用过去完成时had known，主句用would have + 过去分词。would have不能用在if从句中；have是现在时；would不能单独使用。

questions.question: ____ he studied hard, he failed the exam.
questions.explanation: Although引导让步状语从句，用正常语序。Despite和In spite of是介词，后面不能接句子；Regardless of也是介词，意思不符。

questions.question: ____ the weather being fine, we decided to go out.
questions.explanation: With + 名词/代词 + 现在分词构成独立主格结构，表示原因或伴随情况。Because、Since、As都是连词，引导从句，不符合独立主格结构。

questions.question: My brother, ____ lives in Beijing, is a teacher.
questions.explanation: 非限制性定语从句用who指代人，用逗号隔开。which指代物；that不能用于非限制性定语从句；where指地点。

questions.question: You ____ have seen the movie; it's very popular.
questions.explanation: should have + 过去分词表示'本应该'，带有责备或遗憾的语气。must have表示对过去很有把握的推测；could have表示本可能；might have表示可能但不确定。

questions.question: ____ he will come to the party is not known yet.
questions.explanation: Whether引导主语从句，表示'是否'。If也可以引导主语从句，但在句首时多用whether。That引导陈述性主语从句；what引导名词性从句但意思不符。

questions.question: It was not until midnight ____ he finished his work.
questions.explanation: It was not until...that...是强调句型的变体，强调时间状语not until midnight。when引导时间状语从句；what引导名词性从句；which引导定语从句。

questions.question: ____ by the news, she couldn't speak a word.
questions.explanation: 过去分词Shocked作状语，she与shock是被动关系，表示'她被这个消息震惊了'。Shocking表示主动；Being shocked是现在分词的被动式；To shock表示目的。

questions.question: ____ the students in the classroom.
questions.explanation: There be句型的完全倒装结构。students是复数，用There are。There is用于单数；Are there和Is there是疑问句形式。

questions.question: This is the ____ book I have ever read.
questions.explanation: 最高级前加the，表示'最...的'。most interesting是interesting的最高级。more interesting是比较级；interesting是原级；most interestinger是错误形式。

questions.question: It's important that he ____ on time.
questions.explanation: 在It's important that...句型中，that从句的谓语动词用虚拟语气，即should + 动词原形或直接用动词原形。arrives是陈述语气；arrived是过去时；will arrive是将来时。

questions.question: She succeeded ____ passing the difficult exam.
questions.explanation: succeed in是固定搭配，意为'成功做某事'。其他介词不与succeed搭配使用。

questions.question: ____ to catch the early train, he got up at 5 AM.
questions.explanation: 过去分词Determined作状语，表示'他决心要赶上早班车'。Determining是现在分词；Being determined是现在分词的被动式；To determine表示目的，不符合语境。

questions.question: This is the place ____ we first met.
questions.explanation: 先行词是place，在从句中作地点状语，用关系副词where。when指时间；which指物；what引导名词性从句。

questions.question: He ____ have forgotten our appointment; he's always punctual.
questions.explanation: can't have + 过去分词表示对过去情况的否定推测，意为'不可能'。mustn't have表示禁止；shouldn't have表示本不应该；won't have表示将来不会。

questions.question: By the time I arrived, they ____ the meeting.
questions.explanation: by the time引导的时间状语从句，主句用过去完成时。finished是一般过去时；have finished是现在完成时；were finishing是过去进行时。

questions.question: ____ the manager arrives, we cannot start the meeting.
questions.explanation: unless意为'除非'，引导条件状语从句。if引导条件状语从句；until意为'直到'；when引导时间状语从句。

questions.question: The new policy ____ by the board next month.
questions.explanation: policy是动作的承受者，用被动语态will be implemented。will implement是主动语态；implements是一般现在时主动语态；implemented是过去时。

questions.question: His ____ to help others impressed everyone.
questions.explanation: willingness是名词，意为'愿意'。willing是形容词；will是名词/动词；willfully是副词。

questions.question: The book ____ I was referring is very interesting.
questions.explanation: refer to the book，介词to提前，用to which。which指代book，在从句中作介词to的宾语。that不能与介词连用；what引导名词性从句。

questions.question: Had I known about the problem, I ____ it immediately.
questions.explanation: Had I known是If I had known的倒装形式，表示与过去事实相反的虚拟条件句，主句用would have + 过去分词。would solve是与现在事实相反；solved是一般过去时；solve是动词原形。

questions.question: She ____ be the one who broke the vase; she's very careful.
questions.explanation: can't表示对现在情况的否定推测，意为'不可能'。mustn't表示禁止；shouldn't表示不应该；won't表示将来不会。

questions.question: ____ in the heavy rain, he continued walking.
questions.explanation: Despite the heavy rain是介词短语，表示让步。Although和Even though是连词，引导让步状语从句；In spite of也是介词，但不如despite常用。

questions.question: The question is ____ we can trust him.
questions.explanation: whether引导表语从句，表示'是否'。if也可以引导表语从句，但whether更正式。that引导陈述性表语从句；what引导名词性从句但意思不符。

questions.question: ____ come to the meeting yesterday.
questions.explanation: few students是否定意义，表示'几乎没有学生'，可以放在句首倒装。a few students是肯定意义；little修饰不可数名词；students little不符合语法。

questions.question: I ____ for this company for five years.
questions.explanation: 现在完成进行时have been working表示动作从过去开始一直持续到现在。have worked是现在完成时；worked是一般过去时；am working是现在进行时。

questions.question: ____ the weather been better, we would have gone camping.
questions.explanation: Had the weather been better是If the weather had been better的倒装省略if形式，表示与过去事实相反的虚拟条件句。Should the weather be better是将来虚拟；Were the weather better是与现在事实相反。

questions.question: The best way ____ this problem is to discuss it openly.
questions.explanation: 不定式to solve作定语修饰way。solving是动名词；solve是动词原形；solved是过去分词。

questions.question: It was only after he had finished his work ____ he went home.
questions.explanation: It was only after...that...是强调句型，强调时间状语after he had finished his work。when引导时间状语从句；what引导名词性从句；which引导定语从句。

questions.question: This is the ____ solution to the problem.
questions.explanation: 最高级most effective表示'最有效的'。more effective是比较级；effective是原级；most effectively是副词最高级。

questions.question: What underlying assumption does the author make about human nature?
questions.explanation: 作者在文章中暗示人性本质上是合作的，这可以从作者对团队合作和社会互助的积极态度中推断出来。

questions.question: According to the passage, what factor contributed most to the success?
questions.explanation: 文章强调团队合作是成功的最重要因素，多次提到团队协作的重要性。

questions.question: What is the central argument of the passage?
options: Education is the key to economic growth
Environmental protection is more important than development
Global cooperation is essential for solving problems
questions.explanation: 文章的中心论点是全球合作对于解决各种问题至关重要，这是贯穿全文的主题。

questions.question: What does 'paradigm shift' most likely mean in this passage?
questions.explanation: 'paradigm shift'意为'范式转换、根本性变革'，指思维方式或模式的根本性改变。

questions.question: What is the author's tone towards the proposed policy?
questions.explanation: 作者对提议的政策持支持态度，文章中使用了积极正面的词汇来描述政策的潜在益处。

questions.question: How much funding was allocated for the project?
questions.explanation: 文章提到为这个项目分配了200万美元的资金。

questions.question: What is likely to happen if current trends continue?
questions.explanation: 根据文章的分析，如果当前趋势继续下去，情况将会恶化，这是作者想要传达的警告。

questions.question: What is the main focus of the research mentioned in the passage?
questions.explanation: 文章主要研究人类行为，特别是人类在特定环境下的行为模式。

questions.question: In the context of the passage, what does 'synergy' refer to?
questions.explanation: 在文章上下文中，'synergy'指的是协同作用，即合作产生的整体效果大于各部分之和。

questions.question: When was the study originally published?
questions.explanation: 文章提到这项研究最初发表于2021年。

questions.question: What can be inferred about the long-term implications?
questions.explanation: 从文章的分析可以看出，作者对长期影响表示担忧，认为可能带来严重后果。

questions.question: How many participants were involved in the experiment?
questions.explanation: 文章提到实验有150名参与者。

questions.question: What is the author's primary concern mentioned in the passage?
questions.explanation: 作者的主要关注点是环境退化，文章多次提到环境保护的重要性。

questions.question: What does 'innovative' mean in this context?
questions.explanation: 根据上下文，'innovative'意为'创新的、革新的'，强调创造性思维和方法。

questions.question: What conclusion can be drawn from the evidence presented?
questions.explanation: 从提供的证据可以得出结论，假设得到了证实，实验结果支持了最初的假设。

questions.question: What is the recommended frequency for the activity?
questions.explanation: 文章建议这项活动每周进行一次。

questions.question: What is the underlying message of the passage?
questions.explanation: 文章的深层信息是进步需要牺牲，作者通过多个例子说明了这一点。

questions.question: What aspect of the topic is primarily discussed?
questions.explanation: 文章主要讨论当前面临的挑战，分析了各种问题和困难。

questions.question: What does 'resilience' mean in this passage?
questions.explanation: 在文章语境中，'resilience'指的是恢复能力，即从困难或挫折中恢复的能力。

questions.question: What was the outcome of the initiative?
questions.explanation: 文章提到倡议的结果是喜忧参半，既有成功也有不足。

questions.question: What does the author imply about traditional approaches?
questions.explanation: 作者暗示传统方法需要修改以适应新的情况，而不是完全摒弃。

questions.question: What is the primary goal of the organization?
questions.explanation: 文章明确提到该组织的主要目标是促进社会福利。

questions.question: What is the main obstacle to implementing the proposed solution?
questions.explanation: 文章指出对变革的阻力是实施提议解决方案的主要障碍。

questions.question: What does 'sustainable' mean in this context?
questions.explanation: 在文章上下文中，'sustainable'指的是长期可持续的，能够持续发展的。

questions.question: How does the author view the current state of affairs?
questions.explanation: 作者对当前形势持现实主义态度，既不过分乐观也不过分悲观。

questions.question: What is the estimated completion time for the project?
questions.explanation: 文章提到该项目的预计完成时间是18个月。

questions.question: What can be concluded about the future of this field?
questions.explanation: 从文章的趋势分析可以看出，该领域将快速发展。

questions.question: What is the main purpose of this passage?
questions.explanation: 文章的主要目的是提供信息，客观地介绍某个现象或情况。

questions.question: What does 'paradox' most likely mean in this context?
questions.explanation: 'paradox'指的是自相矛盾的情况，与contradiction意思相同。

questions.question: What is the key finding of the research?
options: A hybrid approach is most effective
questions.explanation: 文章的关键发现是混合方法最有效，结合了传统方法和新技术的优势。

questions.question: What is the author's recommendation for future action?
questions.explanation: 作者建议采用新策略来应对当前的挑战。

questions.question: What does 'breakthrough' mean in this context?
questions.explanation: 'breakthrough'指的是重大发现或突破，与discovery意思相同。

questions.question: What is the author's attitude towards innovation?
questions.explanation: 作者对创新持支持态度，认为创新是解决问题的重要途径。

questions.question: What is the success rate mentioned in the passage?
questions.explanation: 文章提到成功率是80%。

questions.question: What is the main message the author wants to convey?
questions.explanation: 作者的主要信息是变革是必要的，只有变革才能解决问题。

questions.question: Which of the following best describes the passage?
questions.explanation: 文章是研究摘要，总结了某项研究的主要发现和结论。

questions.question: What does 'paradigm' refer to in this passage?
questions.explanation: 'paradigm'指的是思维框架或范式，与framework意思相同。

questions.question: What is the cost of the proposed solution?
questions.explanation: 文章提到提议的解决方案成本适中。

questions.question: What evidence supports the author's argument?
questions.explanation: 作者使用了统计数据、专家意见和案例研究来支持自己的论点。

questions.question: What does 'revolutionary' mean in this context?
questions.explanation: 'revolutionary'在文章上下文中指的是创新的、革命性的，与innovative意思相同。
